lead_paragraph: Mr. Arshad, a practicing Muslim with a sizable YouTube following, has toured with a police counterterrorism unit in London, performing stand-up for more than 20,000 students.

headline.print_headline: So, a Counterterrorism Officer and a Muslim Comedian Walk Into a School ...
headline.main: Humza Arshad, British Pakistani Comedian, Takes On Jihadists

snippet: Mr. Arshad, a practicing Muslim with a sizable YouTube following, has toured with a police counterterrorism unit in London, performing stand-up for more than 20,000 students.
abstract: Saturday Profile of British comedian and practicing Muslim, Humza Arshad, who has become central to British government's attempts to dissuade young Muslims from radicalizing and joining Islamic State group.
